name: Sweeper Zero
description: They still come! Alien base is invaded by alien species. As the last hope of mankind, take up your arms, sweep them out !
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,Windows 8.1,Windows 10  64bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD RX470 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,Windows 8.1,Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel i7-6700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD RX480 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space
